code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import userReducer from'./user/user.reducer';import cartReducer from'../redux/cart/cart.reducers';import{persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import directoryReducer from'../redux/directory/directory.reducer';import shopReducer from'../redux/shop/shop.reducers';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage,whitelist:['cart']};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
